<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Create a BitstreamWriter over a raw&#95;ostream \\p OutStream.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If \\p OutStream is a raw&#95;svector&#95;ostream, the BitstreamWriter will write</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// directly to the latter&#39;s buffer. In all other cases, the BitstreamWriter</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// will use an internal buffer and flush at the end of its lifetime.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// In addition, if \\p is a raw&#95;fd&#95;stream supporting seek, tell, and read</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (besides write), the BitstreamWriter will also flush incrementally, when a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// subblock is finished, and if the FlushThreshold is passed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// NOTE: \\p FlushThreshold&#39;s unit is MB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a5f6ee363763723bf98da451e95bb1d1c"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a5f6ee363763723bf98da451e95bb1d1c">BitstreamWriter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OutStream, uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/bitcode/lib/bitcode/writer/bitcodewriter-cpp/#a7a4f14026a779acb2eda1e8107a62f24">FlushThreshold</a> = 512)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// resumes flushing, but does not flush, and returns the section in the</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Basic Primitives for emitting bits to the stream.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===--------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Backpatch a byte in the output at the given bit offset with the specified</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a61b26222d7ecfe417406eec38edba698"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a61b26222d7ecfe417406eec38edba698">BackpatchByte</a>(uint64&#95;t BitNo, uint8&#95;t NewByte) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support">llvm::support</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t ByteNo = BitNo / 8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t StartBit = BitNo &amp; 7;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t NumOfFlushedBytes = GetNumOfFlushedBytes();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ByteNo &gt;= NumOfFlushedBytes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a6d9995bf8da2a0fed6fa31bce97aeebd">endian::readAtBitAlignment</a>&lt;uint8&#95;t, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae1e26e57357947b25e392fd18ab000dbaaae6635e044ac56046b2893a529b5114">llvm::endianness::little</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">                                          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/#a92fe024386465eeb8aeb7c78371549d7af6b11e8bcea1b0b70051b197f2cb3f84">unaligned</a>&gt;(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">                 &amp;Buffer&#91;ByteNo - NumOfFlushedBytes&#93;, StartBit)) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected to be patching over 0-value placeholders&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a60b7cc9c00de00b23725cfa29e75ca3f">endian::writeAtBitAlignment&lt;uint8&#95;t, llvm::endianness::little, unaligned&gt;</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">          &amp;Buffer&#91;ByteNo - NumOfFlushedBytes&#93;, NewByte, StartBit);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we don&#39;t have a raw&#95;fd&#95;stream, GetNumOfFlushedBytes() should have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// returned 0, and we shouldn&#39;t be here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(fdStream() != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the byte offset to backpatch is flushed, use seek to backfill data.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First, save the file position to restore later.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t CurPos = fdStream()-&gt;tell();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Copy data to update into Bytes from the file FS and the buffer Out.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Bytes&#91;3&#93;; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use one more byte to silence a warning from Visual C++.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BytesNum = StartBit ? 2 : 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BytesFromDisk = std::min(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uint64&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(BytesNum), NumOfFlushedBytes - ByteNo);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BytesFromBuffer = BytesNum - BytesFromDisk;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When unaligned, copy existing data into Bytes from the file FS and the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// buffer Buffer so that it can be updated before writing. For debug builds</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// read bytes unconditionally in order to check that the existing value is 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// as expected.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifdef NDEBUG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (StartBit)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">      fdStream()-&gt;seek(ByteNo);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal">      ssize&#95;t BytesRead = fdStream()-&gt;read(Bytes, BytesFromDisk);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">      (void)BytesRead; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// silence warning</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BytesRead &gt;= 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(BytesRead) == BytesFromDisk);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; BytesFromBuffer; ++i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">        Bytes&#91;BytesFromDisk + i&#93; = Buffer&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a6d9995bf8da2a0fed6fa31bce97aeebd">endian::readAtBitAlignment</a>&lt;uint8&#95;t, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae1e26e57357947b25e392fd18ab000dbaaae6635e044ac56046b2893a529b5114">llvm::endianness::little</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal">                                          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/#a92fe024386465eeb8aeb7c78371549d7af6b11e8bcea1b0b70051b197f2cb3f84">unaligned</a>&gt;(Bytes, StartBit)) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected to be patching over 0-value placeholders&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update Bytes in terms of bit offset and value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/support/endian/#a60b7cc9c00de00b23725cfa29e75ca3f">endian::writeAtBitAlignment&lt;uint8&#95;t, llvm::endianness::little, unaligned&gt;</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">        Bytes, NewByte, StartBit);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Copy updated data back to the file FS and the buffer Out.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">    fdStream()-&gt;seek(ByteNo);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">    fdStream()-&gt;write(Bytes, BytesFromDisk);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; BytesFromBuffer; ++i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">      Buffer&#91;i&#93; = Bytes&#91;BytesFromDisk + i&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Restore the file position.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">    fdStream()-&gt;seek(CurPos);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a40de93ba2d72dc6bccd7a1fdde996718"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a40de93ba2d72dc6bccd7a1fdde996718">Emit</a>(uint32&#95;t Val, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumBits) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NumBits &amp;&amp; NumBits &lt;= 32 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Invalid value size!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((Val &amp; ~(~0U &gt;&gt; (32-NumBits))) == 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;High bits set!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">    CurValue |= Val &lt;&lt; CurBit;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurBit + NumBits &lt; 32) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurBit += NumBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add the current word.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="normal">    WriteWord(CurValue);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurBit)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurValue = Val &gt;&gt; (32-CurBit);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurValue = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal">    CurBit = (CurBit+NumBits) &amp; 31;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a87d4d8efe6bca7b041b0837d30add275"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a87d4d8efe6bca7b041b0837d30add275">FlushToWord</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurBit) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">      WriteWord(CurValue);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurBit = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurValue = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// getBlockInfo - If there is block info for the specified ID, return it,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// otherwise return null.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a75bf3c7fbbde90c257abf2fb5a89badf"><Highlight kind="normal">  BlockInfo &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a75bf3c7fbbde90c257abf2fb5a89badf">getBlockInfo</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockID) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Common case, the most recent entry matches BlockID.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!BlockInfoRecords.empty() &amp;&amp; BlockInfoRecords.back().BlockID == BlockID)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;BlockInfoRecords.back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BlockInfo &amp;BI : BlockInfoRecords)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BI.BlockID == BlockID)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;BI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#ae6a40b4a5ea89bb8b5076c26e0d0b638"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#ae6a40b4a5ea89bb8b5076c26e0d0b638">EnterSubblock</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockID, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CodeLen) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// EmitRecord - Emit the specified record to the stream, using an abbrev if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// we have one to compress the output.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Emits the abbreviation \\p Abbv to the stream.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a032ac42ce93b41ccad6f2380a3efa207"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitstreamwriter/#a032ac42ce93b41ccad6f2380a3efa207">EmitAbbrev</a>(std::shared&#95;ptr&lt;BitCodeAbbrev&gt; Abbv) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/bitc/#ab7a76f80792b96a4291e2d1dd1403887a81e1f263b022b7989aa71fb623b62be8">bitc::FIRST&#95;APPLICATION&#95;ABBREV</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// SwitchToBlockID - If we aren&#39;t already talking about the specified block</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;unsigned, 2&gt;</a> V;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><Highlight kind="normal">    V.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(BlockID);</Highlight></CodeLine>
